article.aside: Major addition of the History of UNIX Manpages study. Also moved this page's Table of Contents to its own page (to free up space) and simplified this page. Valuable editorial fixes thanks to an outside contributor: fixed History links and clarified several concepts in the first few chapters among other improvements.
Added GNU troff archives and edited content in Part 3 as suggested by an outside contributor (thanks!).
Polished (editing) text in various places. Cleaned up markup for more variable media. Removed XHTML (of course, it's still used for the ePub) in favour of clean HTML5.
Update the history page to be fully HTML5 and allow for re-sizing the image map. Also add Ingo Schwarze (schwarze@) as the maintainer of mandoc(1).
